title: Gravel Hydration Mastery
subtitle: Stop cramping. Start finishing strong.
description: Everything you need to know about hydration for gravel racing — from sweat rate science to race-day execution. Built from 10+ years of coaching ultra-endurance athletes across the world's hardest gravel events.

instructor.name: Matt Rowe
instructor.title: Head Coach, Gravel God Cycling
instructor.bio: USAC Level 2 coach, 15+ years of endurance coaching experience. Has guided athletes through Unbound 200, BWR, SBT GRVL, and dozens of other premier gravel events. Specializes in the intersection of nutrition science and ultra-endurance performance.

what_youll_learn: Calculate your personal sweat rate and sodium needs
Build a race-specific hydration plan for any distance
Avoid hyponatremia — the silent killer in ultra-endurance
Choose between bottles, packs, and drop bags for your course
Execute a heat adaptation protocol for hot-weather races
Dial in your race-morning and race-day hydration timing

lessons.title: Why Hydration Matters More Than You Think
Bottle vs. Pack vs. Drop Bags

meta_description: Master hydration for gravel racing: sweat rate calculator, electrolyte strategy, heat adaptation, and race-day protocols. 8 interactive lessons for $19.
